email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel is a 150,000 DWT Aframax with an LOA of 250 meters. The laycan is October 15-20. Starting freight quote is in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit on the higher side. Could you consider $49.50 per metric ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can bring the freight rate down to $50.00 per metric ton, but $49.50 is a bit too tight. The demurrage rate is $15,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the update. $50.00 per metric ton is acceptable. However, could we negotiate the demurrage rate to $14,000 per day? Also, please confirm the vessel's details and laycan once more. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I can agree to $14,000 per day for demurrage. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, LOA 250 meters. Laycan remains October 15-20. Please confirm your acceptance so we can proceed with the fixture. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, everything looks good. We accept the terms: $50.00 per metric ton freight rate, $14,000 per day demurrage, and the laycan of October 15-20. Please send over the fixture recap for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Fixture Recap for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, as discussed, please find the fixture recap attached. Vessel: MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, LOA 250 meters. Laycan: October 15-20. Freight rate: $50.00 per metric ton. Demurrage: $14,000 per day. Please confirm receipt and let me know if any changes are needed. Best, Sarah
